short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check your Kaspa wallet and everything around it. You can get your balance, the value in USD, check your rank in 1 click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Very powerful applications that helps you with:
1. Get your Kas balance
2. Shows the balance in KAS and USD as well
3. Shows the current price of KAS
4. Shows how price fluctuated  in the last 24 hours and 7 days
5. Check your Whale status and displays your current rank, the amount of KAS (and USD equivalent) needed for the next rank
6. Access Kaspa official webpage, Kaspa explorer, Chart and Kaspa analytics within the extension

V1.3.1 release notes:
- added QR code for donation
